article: Paul is a worker. One of his feet is bigger than the other . He can't find the right shoes _ his feet. His friend, Dick, says to him, " _ don't you go to a shoemaker  ? A shoemaker can _ you the right shoes." _ Paul goes to the shoemaker near Dick's home. Very soon the shoemaker makes him a pair of shoes. Paul looks at the shoes but he is not happy. He says to the shoemaker, "You aren't _ good shoemaker!I want you to make me one shoe bigger than the other. _ you make me one shoe smaller than the other. "
